details.description: Order a commemorative marriage certificate for a gift or keepsake to mark a silver, ruby, golden or diamond wedding anniversary
details.more_information:
Your original marriage details are printed on a specially designed certificate and mounted in a presentation box.

You’ll need to place your order at least 10 working days before the date you need it.
details.introduction: Register on the General Register Office website to buy a special certificate to mark a silver (25th), ruby (40th), golden (50th) or diamond (60th) wedding anniversary. Certificates cost £23.40.
details.alternate_methods:
Post

To order certificates by post, complete the application form and send it to the General Register Office. The address is on the form.

Download ‘Commemorative marriage certificates’ application form (PDF, 264KB)
expectations: Available in England and Wales only

tags.title: Certificates, register offices, changes of name or gender
